About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi! I’m Joe, I am an IT professional with over 13 years of experience. I have recently taken a shine to programming and web design and started to self-study. Even though I’m new to this, I have learned a lot and I've been having a blast along the way.
My background in system administration, cyber security and help desk has given me a good foundation in networking protocols, system architecture and server setups along with passion for customer support. I feel like my background complements me in my current pursuit to be a full stack web developer.

Accenture Federal Services, contract with VA

System Security Analyst   /   June 2015 to present
  • Scan SQL, Mongodb, MySql, and Oracle databases for vulnerabilities using Trustwave DbProtect and Appdetective Pro
  • Assisted in Building a new multi million dollar VMWare Enterprise database scanning environment to scan all databases in the VA, with over 25 Virtual machines, including SQL, scan engines and consoles
  • Created documentation and SOPs for the new new enterprise scanning environment
  • Activly scan Linux and Microsoft servers for vulnerabilities using Nessus vulnerability Scanner Perform analytics on data and present them to system owners
  • Analyze vulnerability assessment data to identify technical risks to the organization Researched policies, procedures and standards and recommend the needed changes for the protection of information and information systems in the VA

Triple I, Contract with VA

System Admin   /   July 2014 to June 2015
  • install and manage both physical and virtual server environment while Documenting, monitorin and auditing them
  • Provides maintenance to systems and applications
  • Primary resource for server and network hardware and software issues
  • Provides supplemental network and systems administration support to the IT team on large projects
  • Development of performance metrics and hardware/OS performance tuning
  • DHCP, Login Scripts, File/Print Services, DHCP, SCCM, Active Directory, Group Policy Management, System Hardening, SNMP, Patch Management, IIS Web Services, SQL, Scan Remediation, OS Deployment Group Policy Management
  • Microsoft Server platform and its components including Active Directory, Windows Server 2003/2008/2008 R2, failover clustering, certificate services, IIS, and other related technologies

Accenture Federal Services

Lab system Engineer   /   Oct 2013 to June 2014
  • Deployment of new server/storage/network infrastructure in the Lab environments
  • Support lab common services such as AD, DNS, VDI, VMware ESX hosts, physical racking and cableing
